variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC1
variable.description: Q1. A. Stroke history. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam in (mm/dd/yyyy), have you been told by a physician that you had a stroke? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC2A
variable.description: Q2. A. Stroke history. When did this stroke occur [month]? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC3
variable.description: Q3. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. In the past years, since your JHS exams, have you had any sudden loss or changes in speech lasting 24 hours or longer? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC4
variable.description: Q4. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. Did the episode come on suddenly? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC5A
variable.description: Q5a. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Slurred speech like you were drunk? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC5B
variable.description: Q5b. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Could talk but the wrong words came out? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC5C
variable.description: Q5c. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Know what you wanted to say, but the words would not come out? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC5D
variable.description: Q5d. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. Do any of the following describe your change in speech? Could not think of the right words? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC5E
variable.description: Q5e. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. [IF MORE THAN ONE OF ITEMS A-D INDICATED, ASK WHICH OF THESE MOST CLOSELY DESCRIBES THE PROBLEMS?] [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]
variable.value: Could not think of the right words

variable.name: SSFC2B
variable.description: Q2b. When did this stroke occur [year]? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6A
variable.description: Q6a. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Numbness or tingling? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6B
variable.description: Q6b. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Numbness or tingling? Did you have difficulty on: [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6C
variable.description: Q6c. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Paralysis or weakness? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6D
variable.description: Q6d. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Paralysis or weakness? Did you have difficulty on: [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6E
variable.description: Q6e. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Lightheadedness, dizziness, or loss of balance? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6F
variable.description: Q6f. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Blackouts or fainting? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6G
variable.description: Q6g. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Seizures or convulsions? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6H
variable.description: Q6h. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Headache? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6I
variable.description: Q6i. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Visual disturbances? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC6J
variable.description: Q6j. B. Sudden loss or change of speech. While you were having your episode of change in speech did any of the following occur? Visual disturbances? Did you have : [READ ALL CHOICES UNTIL A POSITIVE RESPONSE IS GIVEN] [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]
variable.value: Trouble in both eyes seeing to both sides or straight ahead

variable.name: SSFC7
variable.description: Q7. C. Sudden loss of vision. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had any sudden loss of vision, or blurring, lasting 24 hours or longer? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC8
variable.description: Q8. C. Sudden loss of vision. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had any sudden loss of vision, or blurring, lasting 24 hours or longer? Did the episode come on suddenly? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC9A
variable.description: Q9a. C. Sudden loss of vision. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had any sudden loss of vision, or blurring, lasting 24 hours or longer? During the episode, which of the following parts of your vision were affected? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC9B
variable.description: Q9b. C. Sudden loss of vision. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had any sudden loss of vision, or blurring, lasting 24 hours or longer? Did you have: [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]
variable.value: Trouble seeing to the right, but not the left
Trouble seeing to the left, but not the right
Trouble seeing both sides or straight ahead

variable.name: SSFC14
variable.description: Q14. E. Sudden numbness or tingling. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you ever had sudden numbness, tingling, or loss of feeling on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted 24 hours or longer? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC15
variable.description: Q15. E. Sudden numbness or tingling. Did the feeling of numbness or tingling occur only when you kept your arms or legs in a certain position? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC16
variable.description: Q16. E. Sudden numbness or tingling. Did the feeling of numbness or tingling occur only when you kept your arms or legs in a certain position? Did the episode come on suddenly? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC17A
variable.description: Q17a. E. Sudden numbness or tingling. During the episode of sudden numbness of tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left arm or hand? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC17B
variable.description: Q17b. E. Sudden numbness or tingling. During the episode of sudden numbness of tingling, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left leg or foot? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC18
variable.description: Q18. E. Sudden numbness or tingling. During this episode, did the abnormal sensation start in one part of your body and spread to another, or did it stay in the same place? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]
variable.value: Started in one part and spread to another

variable.name: SSFC20
variable.description: Q20. F. Sudden paralysis or weakness. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had any sudden episode of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]

variable.name: SSFC21
variable.description: Q21. F. Sudden paralysis or weakness. In the past 5 years, since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had any sudden episode of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body, including your face, arm, or leg which lasted at least 24 hours? Did the episode come on suddenly? [Visit 9] [Stroke Symptomes Form, SSF]
